item.title: EPSRC Pioneers Competition
item.description: Our project FaceLift: A deeplearning pipeline to beautify urban space, has been shortlisted in the highly selective EPSRC Pioneers competetion. We are one of the top 16 Ph.D. projects around U.K.

item.title: Nvidia GPU Grant
item.description: We have receieved the Nvidia GPU seed grant, which I wrote on my Lab’s behalf. The award would increase Netsys’s compute infrastructure with the help of a Nvidia Titan Xp GPU for our deep learning needs
